title: Reaction To The Westbrook Trade, NBA Draft Recap
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss the trade sending Russell Westbrook to the Lakers, why the fit may be an issue, where Kyle Lowry will land this offseason and if Ben Simmons can get traded . Then the guys dive into the NBA Draft including a player who went later than expected who could make a huge impact.

itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Reaction To The Blockbuster Westbrook Deal To LA, NBA Draft Recap
